title: How to Mix a Day at the Beach Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill the cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour the coconut rum into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the amaretto into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the orange juice into the cocktail shaker.
Shake well and pour into a highball glass.
Pour grenadine on top and add the fruit for garnish.

text: Fill the cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour the coconut rum into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the amaretto into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the orange juice into the cocktail shaker.  Shake well and pour into a highball glass.  Pour grenadine on top and add the fruit for garnish.
